lines.text: ...Maybe it really was to try and cast Emergency Exit.
If he had a gun pointed at him, maybe he was desperate- thought he could power the spell with determination.
And then it obviously didn't work, so he abandoned the plan and put himself out.
But... that ain't how magic works at all, right?
Yeah, it really isn't. It's kind of hard to believe someone would make that mistake.
I'll hold on to that idea, for if we can't think of anything better.
